statements: SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM payment_history ORDER BY user_id ASC, payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY user_id ASC, payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id FROM payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, amount FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 5000 AND customer_id = 123
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_date FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT payment_id, action, action_date FROM payment_history WHERE action = 'refund'
SELECT * FROM payments p JOIN payment_history ph ON p.payment_id = ph.payment_id
SELECT * FROM payment_history;
SELECT id, user_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT payment_id, action FROM payment_audit ORDER BY action_date;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_history;
SELECT payment_id, action FROM payment_audit ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, payment_id, action, action_date FROM payment_audit JOIN payment_history ON payment_audit.payment_id = payment_history.id;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT log_description, log_timestamp FROM payment_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY audit_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_address LIKE '%London%';
SELECT audit_id, user_id, action, audit_timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY audit_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT method_name, is_active FROM payment_methods WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT method_name, is_active FROM payment_methods WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT action, action_date FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_analysis GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
